trend_summary: Across the time series, the small central town slowly expands along the main highway, adding compact housing clusters and a few industrial sheds, while surrounding patchwork farmland and forest remain dominant. Development is modest and dispersed, indicating limited rural growth with minimal landscape alteration.
notable_changes: New residential enclave appears south of the town in later images.
Light-industrial buildings added west of the highway junction.
Main northâ€“south road widened and straightened in mid-period imagery.
Forest regrowth patches evident on the western slopes.
Several cropland parcels converted to pasture or fallow grassland.
